name: Triamid Guardian
text: While you control a face-up "Triamid" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, this card's original level becomes 3 while it is face-up on the field. You can only Special Summon "Triamid Guardian" once per turn this way. (Quick Effect): You can send 1 other face-up "Triamid" card on your side of the field to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Triamid" monster from your hand or Deck. You can only activate this effect of "Triamid Guardian" once per turn.
